website_summaries.verdict: Designed specifically for the shower, these flip flops have drainage holes and style to spare.

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept --poor execution
customer_reviews.text: They feel heavy and mushy on my feet once they are wet. At first, I thought the water would flow through, lighten the shoe and keep my feet dryer. Alas, I was mistaken as the shoe material soaked the water up and held it like a sponge. They were not pleasant to wear when wet. And they take forever to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Narcisse

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT and perfect for my use and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised! I wouldn’t necessarily categorize these as flip flops but extremely comfortable sandals and perfect for the pool and Fitness Center and I find myself wearing them around the house all the time when I am in bear feet. A little harder to wear socks but doable. The Velcro can get tangled with the socks but with a little adjustment they work fine. I just use my regular supported leather sandals instead. In all honesty, their may be laziness involved here and easier to switch than adjust. The only complaint is there is no arch support at all, just flat. Still very comfortable and serves just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: The product does NOT protect against infections and fungus. We bought the one for women and for men, so we bought 2 pairs. WASTE. Misleading customers falsely by advertising micro bacterial, as other customers shared in the feedback. I found out the hard way, and the form could be the reason since the shoes hold water and bacteria in them. Bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm very finicky when it comes to showers. Even my own. I can clean it several times a week but still can't manage to put my feet in there no matter what. That's why I bought these. Non slip. Water literally goes through them and they dry up fast. Thinking about getting a second pair for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Shower sandals
customer_reviews.text: The shower tile floor was painful to my feet due to diabetic neuropathy. These sandals provided the perfect answer. No more pain and no worries about mildew under bath mats.
customer_reviews.author: Bubucitis

customer_reviews.title: Great shower shoe, runs small on sizing
customer_reviews.text: Order one size larger, as these run small. I wear a size 10, but ordered the large due to warnings in the reviews. Glad I followed that advice! Other than the size, I love these shower shoes. Lightweight, takes up very little room in the gym bag, dries out super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Gym Shower Use
customer_reviews.text: My gym has very slippery floors in and leading into the shower room, so wearing these have been a godsend. They are light, comfortable, sturdy, and fit nicely in my gym bag. They seem to dry very quickly as well. I love em!
customer_reviews.author: MovieGuyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: High Quality & Very Comfortable - Men's Sizing Chart is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The Men's Sizing Chart is accurate as I measured my purchased Men's 11/12 length which came to almost exactly 12 inches which matches the {Size Chart - Size 11/12 - Foot measurement up to 12"}. I did order a size larger than I needed, but the adjustable Velcro gives me a nice fit...and I like having the extra foot bed space top & bottom as a bumper to protect my toes/heels from bumps. The quality is worth the cost of these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Like glue on slippery floors
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift after I had purchased a pair myself to combat deadly shower floors at the gym. He loved them as much as I did, after complaining for months about how treacherous the shower floors were at the gym we can finally feel safe.
customer_reviews.author: Homesteader

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this due to poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After a months use of this pair, it is already falling apart. Everything is starting to tear on both slides, including the Velcro part. It doesn’t even hold anymore. I definitely do not recommend this. Especially with the price they listed this with. I was expecting these to last at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Not well made, but great idea.
customer_reviews.text: I got two pairs one for me and another for a friend. I did not like at first there was something shiny in the sole right out the bag, then noticed the crappy glue job. The quality was also poor with the velcrow as well with a part of it folded up, and some of the fabric was frayed. The second pair had problem with the glue as well as some black stuff on them, and one side was not glued all the way on. I expected quality when paying $32 for shower shoes, not even some cheaper ones have those flaws. I guess they get you at antimicrobial.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: The shower shoe you need.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these when I am on deployment each year. The bathrooms in Afghanistan and Iraq are not the cleanest but these help out a lot. They dry fast and do not hold any mold or odor. The holes in them let water drain away with no problem. I would highly recommend these if you are a deploying person.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: May not fit men with higher than typical insteps
customer_reviews.text: If your insteps are higher than normal, the flap that fastens the sandal to your foot may not (was not, for me) long enough--I just barely can get the two parts of the flap to stick together at their very ends.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Came used.
customer_reviews.text: They showed up with obvious signs of previous wear. Debris, dirt, and glass were imbedded in the soles.
customer_reviews.author: rkfol123

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, no smell
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how the manufacturer determined that they are anti microbial, but I will say they do not smell like my last inexpensive pair
customer_reviews.author: Snowracer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes!!! My husband is handicap and he loves these shoes! It’s easy for him to get in and out of the shower. Plus, they don’t stink from getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Best Shower Shoes I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shower shoes I have ever used! They are super comfortable and all the holes in the soles help with draining. The shoes did not lose their grip when wet.
customer_reviews.author: KrisKrisKris

customer_reviews.title: Shower protect!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson needed shower shoes for college. Fit great and they will help protect his feet and lower legs from germs.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Looks comfortable and are adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered grey and black but received solid black ones, otherwise; they look like they will work well in the shower for my husband who has foot issues. They are a little pricey for just taking a shower but if they hold up, it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: My feet are happy!
customer_reviews.text: I have foot neuropathy and standing on a stone shower floor hurts my feet. These shower shoes work great ! They even come with a cute little shoe hanger that fits over the shower nozzle to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy O

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but design doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Tried these and they are comfortable but the perforated design doesn't work as well as I'd expected. The holes end up retaining water so you have to shake them to get them completely dry. I would recommend normal flip flops (Havaianas) instead.
customer_reviews.author: wlshr

customer_reviews.title: Works for swollen feet!
customer_reviews.text: Gives good, gripping traction. The adjustability makes them work even for swollen feet.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: but they are great quality and work well at the pool and in ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the least expensive out there by a long shot, but they are great quality and work well at the pool and in the shower at the gym. I will purchase them again if they ever wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Harry C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my brother who is a size 13 and they fit perfectly. Hard to find these in larger sizes, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Vsvalerie

customer_reviews.title: Haven't taken them off since they arrived
customer_reviews.text: These are, by far, the most comfortable "flip flops" I have ever worn. I haven't taken them off since they arrived earlier today. I was worried they might be a little slippery on my hardwood floors, but nope! These have a nice grip to the soles.
customer_reviews.author: Holland Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Velcro fails.
customer_reviews.text: Used in the shower at the gym, 5-6 days/wk for a little over the past year. The velcro has failed, snd I can't walk in them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable feature is a plus
customer_reviews.text: These sandals kept slipping sideways as I moved around. I could not keep my foot straight in them. They are a good quality but didn't work for my flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Dorm/Shower room use
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came as described. However, I’m concerned of how the Velcro will hold up. I do like the thickness and comfort of the sandal.
customer_reviews.author: naasahin

customer_reviews.title: No funky feet
customer_reviews.text: Them thangs keep mah feet sweet without the stink. No funky feet when I wash mah meat. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality or comfort, but still useful
customer_reviews.text: They aren't very comfortable, and the Velcro was torn off of my shoes when they arrived. I'm gonna have to superglue these or something. I'm only going to try to use these since I need antimicrobial shoes for public showers
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kettell

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: Husbands review: Lightweight, drains water, no worries in public showers.
customer_reviews.author: TanyaBo

customer_reviews.title: Go larger than the measurement guide!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you measure the foot as the website says and then order that size they will be too small. My son should have been spot on for this size - his foot is just a bit too big. If you wear a size 10 shoe buy the large. He had to go off to college, and I had no more time to deal with it so he took the size we ordered and will make it work for the year. It is not ideal though.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda F

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The sandal was decomposing and little black things would fall off it and go down the drain. I switched to some sandals I bought at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pascarelli

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Too
customer_reviews.text: They are not slippery in the shower and are very comfortable. They dry well and there is no sign of any kind of mold forming on them.
customer_reviews.author: jz

customer_reviews.title: and very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Use in school showers, no mold yet, and very comfortable... it would be helpful to make them in a wide, the straps are adjustable but don't like the sides of feet hanging over.
customer_reviews.author: dtegreen

customer_reviews.title: For germaphobes
customer_reviews.text: If you ever had to take a shower in a pubic shower then you'll understand why these where invented. I wear these in my own shower at home too. Just part of my routine. Really like them
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: A little on the pricey side for a college dorm ...
customer_reviews.text: A little on the pricey side for a college dorm, but needed them. There are others out there, but the Showaflops seem to last.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Great for college dorm
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the short walk down the hall and in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Teacherof7

customer_reviews.title: These are great for gym shower room
customer_reviews.text: They don't retain water and very easy to dry. The price is somewhat high, but worth the cost. Cheaper shower shoes either retain water or smell when drying.
customer_reviews.author: ckennedy

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect! Fits so nice and great looking
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Fits so nice and great looking. Really good quality. Bought for my son in college who's sharing a shower! This was a really good buy!
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic9

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: The holes in the sole pinch your feet a little but other than that they’re great
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Made in china
customer_reviews.text: I don't think they are any better than a 10 dollar pair at Walmart i would not buy them again
customer_reviews.author: walter scoville

customer_reviews.title: They lasted a whole year but I like to refresh his stuff yearly
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair. Get my son these for college. They lasted a whole year but I like to refresh his stuff yearly. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Frisby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these sandals and are perfect for every day use at his college dorm.
customer_reviews.author: Coyoles

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. No complaints here. Made for a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and seem like they will hold up to regular sauna / shower use
customer_reviews.author: Tim Raz

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered up a size and were still too small. However, they are as pictured as made nicely
customer_reviews.author: ACH3NC

customer_reviews.title: great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: My husband is happy with them and he is picky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in a Hospital and has to share a shower. He says he wears these everywhere, they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Pat McWhorter

customer_reviews.title: This is THE shower shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Firm, sized right and stylish too! Dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: Fat Feet? No Problem. A Little Long.
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 EEE, and getting the 11/12 size was too long, but perfectly wide enough. I returned them and ordered a 9/10, hopefully that will fit better.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: light weight, fit as expected, does the job. what more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Safety
customer_reviews.text: I have several very painful calluses on each foot. These shower shoes protect my feet from the hard surface of the shower floor. In addition, any slippery surface in the shower or tub/shower is far safer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Shower Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Extremely please with these shoes. Excellent quality and traction in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES L

customer_reviews.title: Safety in the shower! i bought 2 pair - ...
customer_reviews.text: Safety in the shower! i bought 2 pair - one for home, another for travel that stays in our luggage.
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shower shoes, perfect for college. They were a little more than I wanted to spend, but are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann K

customer_reviews.title: Showaflops mens water sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Hubby is swim coach these are great on pool deck
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear. Drys fast. Wear a size 12 shoe. The 11-12 fits perfect! Use the Velcro adjustment as required.. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product... no issues so far. Would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: John Engel

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves These
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the shower and safe as well. I recommend these shower slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Bear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great idea; drains well as pool/shower sandal; water will come up as well if you walk on wet grass
customer_reviews.author: jkg

customer_reviews.title: For my son in college. although he has only ...
customer_reviews.text: For my son in college. although he has only been there 15 days, they are working as they are suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: forgetmenot.4

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shower shoes however wouldn't recommend as many holes in the sole
customer_reviews.author: Joey Farina

customer_reviews.title: Good, Just a Bit Small
customer_reviews.text: Just bit small for my size 13 feet. Otherwise good. Apparently well made, reasonably comfortable. These are designed for gym/shower...not running around on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: JeffC

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and cleanliness
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Exactly as advertises. Use them daily, and sometimes twice daily - not an issue yet and have had them 5+ months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are very nice I was just hoping they came in a size ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice I was just hoping they came in a size 15 as my son will be using there at college and he is a size 15.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loves the comfort of having no annoying thong between his toes
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these in the college dorm shower. He loves the comfort of having no annoying thong between his toes.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL A HOGAN

customer_reviews.title: Shower Shoes
customer_reviews.text: For a size 12-13 they were far to small and not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B Allison

customer_reviews.title: Best Slippers to date for use in showers/pool
customer_reviews.text: Non-skid...works well in showers at the gym and when visiting the pool. No more wet feet feel in slippers. True to size. Adjustable to personal width preference.
customer_reviews.author: J Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I though.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what they looked like and I use them for my gym showers 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The quality’s better than similar products
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good, the fit was just right. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good flops
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of tendonitis in my feet and I use these flops in the shower and no longer experience any pain. They have a strap so you can adjust the fit. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for public showers! Very durable, and dry decently fast!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is drying fast but when you walk not that much comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My new guest shower has a pebble tile floor. I love these floors and enjoy the pressure points on my feet when I step around on the pebbles. But I recognize that some people might find the floors difficult to stand on, so I bought these shower shoes in several different sizes to accommodate my guests. These shoes are comfortable and don't slip on the wet floor, or with wet feet inside them. They were exactly what I needed to make my guests completely at ease in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Berger

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: I find them to be heavy and uncomfortable because the gripping texture on your foot is very aggressive and feels like sandpaper with bumps in it. I think it could be toned down a bit and still be safe. That said, the sizing is right and I still use them.
customer_reviews.author: Skylab Industries

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are of low quality with the bottom at front being so flimsy that you can easily trip if your foot is too close to the ground and at the wrong angle when you take a step. They tend to bend terribly at the front upon contact with a surface, especially a carpeted surface. I did not know that this garbage was made in China, or I would not have purchased it. i would rate this product 0/5 if that option was available.
customer_reviews.author: bizhan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good: they haven't stunk up my gym bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good : they haven't stunk up my gym bag yet
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Especially for student athletes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Kept my son's feet safe in the locker room showers, and dried quickly. Would recommended to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The front sole of the sandal catches the ground when walking normally. Most flip flops are somewhat curved in the front so this area is not caught on the ground and turned over. I would return but have worn 5 times hoping that they would "self correct".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband has a hard time finding casual shoes, ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a hard time finding casual shoes, sandals or shower shoes due to the width of his feet. While these shoes are not geared for wide feet they are adjustsble
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately returned, too wide.
customer_reviews.text: This product was okay, it had a great concept and was what I was looking for - however the sides were way too wide for my feet. If you got a wide foot then this is perfect for you. However, my feet were slipping to the sides with this product.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sandals
customer_reviews.text: They are starting to pull apart after just a few times wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Mc

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done for Now.
customer_reviews.text: They stay dry, keep my feet dry, and fit ok. They feel a little cheap though.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. T. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: squeak when you walk and don't fit well on feel ...
customer_reviews.text: squeak when you walk and don't fit well on feel. wish it had an elevated arch to keep them tight on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: they fold under your feet easily..
customer_reviews.text: If you don't pick up your feet, they fold under your feet easily...
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Kerrisk

customer_reviews.title: Love the flops.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say I like these shower flops they are just what I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Not for walking outside
customer_reviews.text: OK for walking from your locker to the shower at the gym. But not OK walking from the parking lot to the gym. They don't stay on your feet. They do dry out quickly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J N Overton

customer_reviews.title: They don't  hold to your feet enough.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed good quality, but dont really hold to your feet-I easily slip out of them, which is not too good in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I camp a lot and wanted these to keep in my RV for when I have to use a public shower facility. The water drained right out and I felt great that I didn't have to touch the floor with my bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Newland

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was time for a new pair of gym shower slippers. A little pricey but they feel good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower flops
customer_reviews.text: Got the shower flops for my son and he really liked them
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne St. Francois

product_meta.title: Showaflops Mens' Antimicrobial Shower & Water Sandals for Pool, Beach, Dorm and Gym - Adjustable Colorblock Slide
feature_bullets: The first - and most stylish - flip flops designed to protect your feet from all those places that germs might lurk
Perfect for public showers, gyms, steam rooms, dorms, camps, pools, locker rooms… anywhere your feet take you
Include unique drainage hole designs, antimicrobial layers & slip resistant soles to protect your feet against mold, fungus & bacteria on floors
So comfortable & fun - you will wear them everywhere!
Please see the size chart below for accurate sizing and then… Get Your Flop On!!!
